text: Illumination is an American movie and animation studio. It is founded by Chris Meledandri in 2007 and is owned by Universal Pictures, a division of NBCUniversal. NBCUniversal is a division of Comcast. The Minions are Illumination's mascots. ==Filmography== ==References== Category:2007 establishments in California Category:American movie studios
title: Illumination (company)
